segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: Hi, I'm Cooksey.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: And I'm Paul.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: We've started something really exciting and we want you to be the first to know about it.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: It's all about creativity, helping creators to do their best work faster, better and easier.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: But first, a bit of history. We both cut our teeth in TV and VFX and then found ourselves in the world of E learning. It's there at a company called Circus street that we were able to collaborate, argue, bounce ideas off each other for over a decade.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: At Circuit street, our real Advantage was creativity. While our competitors were just ticking boxes, we were building something different.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: A product driven by innovation, quality, and genuine creativity.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: That's what set us apart.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: All of that experience, insight, shared passion led us to Nice Touch. A new chapter dedicated entirely to empowering creators like never before.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: Introducing Nice Touch. We're calling it the operating system for Creators.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: Not an actual os, but a smart, intuitive set of tools that streamline your existing creative processes.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: This means smoother workflows, fewer disruptions, more opportunities to create amazing work, leading to better projects, more gigs, and more income for creators.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: We're not trying to automate creativity itself. We want to take away the mundane tasks that hold you back.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: Every creator understands the frustration of losing valuable hours to repetitive tasks, things like checking exports, organizing files, chasing feedback.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: We want to remove those barriers, helping you to spend more time doing what you genuinely love creating.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: We're just at the start of this journey and we need you.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: We wouldn't be where we are now if we hadn't worked with some of the most talented and amazing people.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: It's all about collaboration.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: So we're at the start of this journey and we need you.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: We wouldn't be where we are now if we hadn't worked with some of the most talented and amazing people.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: It's all about collaboration.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: So whether it's just the chat or you want to see what we're up to, let's get involved and let's do this.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: Go sign up on the site, it's nicetouch app. Come chat with us on Discord.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: We're online most days

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: Got our numbers, just give us a call or drop us a message.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: This is just the beginning. Who knows where we'll end up, but it's going to be big.

segments.speaker: Paul
segments.text: Join us for the journey.
